entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High 7.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 1 May 2023
